item.description:
All,

Another week of flag-football is upon us. We will be continuing to provide all skill levels with an opportunity to have a fun time playing flag-football. We will play at Cambridge Common and encourage all to attend. We are very friendly and a great group to play flag-football with. We hope to see you on Saturday @ 2pm.

Flag-Footballers
item.name: Flag Football - Cambridge Common - 2PM
